Follow President @fhollande's statement at the end of the Franco-German digital conference https://t.co/1ggCCxDhvl #DirectPR
#DirectPR "What is playing is decisive for our economies but also for Europe" @fhollande
#DirectPR "Without being organized, will Europe leave behind the tremendous opportunity that is digital?"
"The French Tech was for the Germans the opportunity to see what could be done to support start-ups" #directPR
"BPI and KFW have decided to work together to strengthen their support for innovative companies" #DirectPR
#DirectPR "Computing and artificial intelligence are other areas in which we will be closer"
"I want to salute this Franco-German alliance on digital" #DirectPR
"Our responsibility is to prepare for the future We must be a driving force in the digital world" #DirectPR
"We will launch alliances for the industry of the future to promote digital transition for all businesses" #DirectPR
"We want to be able to train employees in the industries of the future." Youth training needs to be expanded "#DirectPR
"In France, we have created a large decentralized digital school to recruit all talents" #DirectPR
"We have launched a program to make digital checks available to SMEs to accelerate their transition" #DirectPR
#DirectPR "We work together for a European regulation to protect personal data"
